Articles.Content:
Hey there guys, Pleborian here with some exclusive footage for you all to chow down on

Enjoy!!

EDIT: please be aware that the quality of this test version may not reflect the quality of the final release, and that things can change in a kerbal heartbeat if they need to

EDIT 2: please also be aware that this version is not currently available for download, 0.21 is not out yet

Edited July 19, 2013 by Pleborian

How do you have access to this.

I'm jealous.
The media group baby, that and squads PR guy is the MAN!!!
Isn't Maxmap the PR guy?
yeah he is, getting our hands on this is all thanks to the huge effort on his part

When I first saw the title, I thought 0.21 already came out.

Damn you Pleborian...
Looking a lot more professional and polished. I think update the rest of the planets like this and a few more features and this will almost be a completed game!
Maxmaps let me hug you.
Why Why do you post this JUST after I get to work!!!! Curse you!!!

space center looks great still looks like a bunch of buildings scattered around but that can be fixed once we get all the buildings we need. astronaut complex disappointed me a little, I was expecting maybe an interior look in the building in some way, maybe a first person view from like a recruitment room or something, but it still looks like a good feature either way.

also, I'm still kinda new here, but what exactly is the KSP media group and how do you join?

EDIT: what happened to the flag pole?
Kinda curious about why some people say things like not point 21 instead of zero. Or have I misunderstood something?

Kinda curious about why some people say things like not point 21 instead of zero. Or have I misunderstood something?

It's cultural certain regions are simply more likely to say naught or nought instead of zero.

helicopter pads on top of the VAB?

check.

edit:

trucks running over engineers inside the VAB?

check!

Edited July 19, 2013 by Francesco

I'm still kinda new here, but what exactly is the KSP media group and how do you join?

EDIT: what happened to the flag pole?

the media group is a bunch of youtubers who promote the game on behalf of squad, pretty much the best KSP players around people like:

Chickenkeeper24

Danny2462

DrJonez

Harv (HOCGaming)

Macey Dean

TheWinterOwl

OperationDX

xPDxTV (Also the media director for squad)

Ryan the Solar gamer

Scott Manley

StreetlampPRO

xxLeGoldfishxx

and myself (obviously)

were not really looking to expand the group at the moment because its already pretty big, but if you have a youtube channel that has a decent amount of KSP on there (or unique content that no-one else covers) then there is a chance you will have one of us knocking on your door.

also the flag pole is still there, just on the astronaut complex

Kinda curious about why some people say things like not point 21 instead of zero. Or have I misunderstood something?

I think it's the way they say it in the UK/scotland etc.

But seriously, I saw Dany's video and the buildings are so beautiful I nearly teared up. Artyom, you are the best thing that happened to this game since SRBs. Praise the 3D god.

the media group is a bunch of youtubers who promote the game on behalf of squad, pretty much the best KSP players around people like:

Chickenkeeper24

Danny2462

DrJonez

Harv (HOCGaming)

Macey Dean

TheWinterOwl

OperationDX

xPDxTV (Also the media director for squad)

Ryan the Solar gamer

Scott Manley

StreetlampPRO

xxLeGoldfishxx

and myself (obviously)

were not really looking to expand the group at the moment because its already pretty big, but if you have a youtube channel that has a decent amount of KSP on there (or unique content that no-one else covers) then there is a chance you will have one of us knocking on your door.

also the flag pole is still there, just on the astronaut complex

I don't do any KSP youtube videos right now. though if I could find the model for the kerbals I would try getting that to work in source filmmaker and do some animation. anyway thanks for explaining about the group

Hey there guys, Pleborian here with some exclusive footage for you all to chow down on

Awesome video Pleborian, well done allround on the presentation. Huge thanks to both you and everyone else who made this sneak preview possible.

And I'm with chris on this one... jealous.

When I first saw the title, I thought 0.21 already came out.

Damn you Pleborian...

I checked the store for the download. Then I was like what the ??

Damn you for getting my hopes up!

enjoying every minute of this

Pleborian, in the video you say 0.21 has a lot of KSPX parts now turned into stock parts, did I hear you right?

can you tell us which ones they are, exactly?

scrap that, you kinda already answered that one minute later into the video

Edited July 19, 2013 by Francesco
Bloody awesome, I can't wait!

It's cultural certain regions are simply more likely to say naught or nought instead of zero.

Oh I see, makes sense. Good to know :3.

Pleb said, "...look back 5 or 6 weeks and say to myself, how did I manage to survive KSP without these things (new ASAS)..." Well, I guess you don't fly spaceplanes using a joystick We joystick users experience exactly the same amount of "control" that you get with spaceplanes with that new ASAS, WITHOUT having to USE (the old) ASAS, esp. if you've been flying with a joystick in flight simulators for over TWENTY YEARS *chuckle*.

As for me, where the new ASAS will shine is its "killrot-style" capabilities for non-winged spacecraft.

Edited July 19, 2013 by rodion_herrera
Now I need to pick up my jaw off the floor again... SQUAD Y U BE SO AWESOME
tbh honest I have never actually owned a proper joystick, I was brought up on the good old keyboard an mouse

tbh honest I have never actually owned a proper joystick, I was brought up on the good old keyboard an mouse

Which is why But yes, I do welcome the new ASAS in spaceplanes as well, esp. if the spaceplane I'm flying is complicated enough that one has to deal with other stuff and just let the thing fly at a specific orientation. Loved your video btw. Rock on.
